text: was a Japanese journalist and politician who was Prime Minister of Japan from 1956 to 1957. He studied at Waseda University. He was a journalist for the Mainichi Shimbun. ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Politicians from Yamanashi Prefecture Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Japanese journalists Category:Waseda University alumni Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Tanzan Ishibashi
